name: Maize Farming Guide
info: Optimal in Agro-Ecological Zones LH 1-3, UM 1-4, LM 1-4. Recommended nitrogen fertilization increases yields by 60%.

name: Drought-resistant Sorghum
info: Grows best in UM 4-5 and LM 4-5 zones. Resilient to low rainfall and requires early planting for optimal yields.

name: Tomato Greenhouse Kit
info: Ideal for highland regions with consistent temperature control. Enhances tomato yields by 3x compared to open-field farming.

name: Soil Testing Kit
info: Essential for determining nutrient deficiencies and pH imbalances. Advisable before applying any fertilizer.

name: Aquaponic System Blueprint
info: Combines fish farming with hydroponic vegetable production. Suitable for smallholder urban farmers.

name: Drone Spraying Services
info: Efficient for large farms, reducing pesticide use by up to 30% while ensuring even application.

name: Sweet Potato Varieties Guide
info: KSP 1 and KSP 2 are recommended for regions with moderate rainfall (UM 3-5).

name: Lime Application Advisory
info: Lime corrects acidic soils prevalent in LM 4-5 zones, enabling better nutrient absorption.

name: Water Harvesting Techniques
info: Critical for semi-arid areas. Techniques include zai pits, water pans, and contour bunds.
